translations: 顺利地；有利地；好意地（等于 favorably）

sentences.sentence: He speaks very favourably of your work.
sentences.translation: 他对你的工作十分赞赏。

sentences.sentence: She seems favourably disposed to the move.
sentences.translation: 她似乎对这一行动持赞同态度。

sentences.sentence: I was very favourably impressed with her work.
sentences.translation: 她的工作给我留下了很好的印象。
